about_the_game:
Life isn't easy as a futuristic rideshare driver, especially when people keep leaving bees in your passenger seat. Take the helm in this cyberpunk comedy. Transport the eccentric citizens of the city. Escape your past, and like, overcome class inequity or something.


Take the helm in this cyberpunk uber driver narrative mystery. Traverse the city delivering contraband and nefarious passengers. Rekindle old contacts and reconnect with an underworld you were trying to leave behind.


  • Take The Helm: From a 1st person perspective, accept jobs and transport citizens around a futuristic city
  • Uncover Mysteries: Converse with passengers to learn about themselves, the city, and uncover a greater mystery
  • Do Something About The Bees: bzzz
  • Rekindle old contacts: Develop meaningful connections, or sever ties.
  • Escape your past: Uncover your own story and escape your past.

content_descriptors.notes: The player character has relations with the criminal underworld. Therefore there are references to criminal activity. The player character takes a black-market drug to deal with their cybernetics. Drug references are mentioned in passing only.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5-10600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Neon Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you like
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-10600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
